changelog: New！ Timer Quick Entity—real-time HA timer display with second-level countdown, tap to pause/resume, smart state sync. Single-card recommended, supports up to 6. Add timer.xxx IDs in Quick Entity Panel. Auto-formats MM:SS or H:MM:SS, 30-sec calibration for 5min+ timers, custom MDI icons. Voice control ready. Screensaver fully rebuilt—3-hour debug fixed race condition. Floating subtitle layout fixed, error boundaries patched. Low-end device optimizations, aggressive APK compression. Thanks @zxjrm, @lenne0815, @ohjables.
